title: Unicef applauds joint call from four main religions in Myanmar for religious tolerance for the ...
text: ( Source : UNICEF UK ) 21 October 2015 - Unicef welcomes the joint statement released by Interfaith for Children , calling for the respect of religious freedom and tolerance as essential conditions for every child to grow and develop to her/his
